lyrics.lyric: I Turn to You
When I'm lost in the rain
In your eyes I know I'll find the light
lyrics.tlyric: 透过你的双眸，我知道我定能找到那束光

lyrics.lyric: To light my way
And when I'm scared and losing ground
When my world is going crazy
lyrics.tlyric: 每当我的世界逐渐失控

lyrics.lyric: You can turn it all around
And when I'm down, you're there pushing me to the top
lyrics.tlyric: 每当我意志消沉，你总是在我身旁，鞭策我不断攀登

lyrics.lyric: You're always there giving me all you've got
lyrics.tlyric: 你总是在一旁，给予我你所拥有的一切

lyrics.lyric: For a shield from the storm
For a friend, for a love
To keep me safe and warm
I turn to you
For the strength to be strong
lyrics.tlyric: 你是那股让我坚强的力量

lyrics.lyric: For the will to carry on
lyrics.tlyric: 你是那份让我坚持下去的意志

lyrics.lyric: For everything you do, for everything that's true
lyrics.tlyric: 你为我付出的一切，都如此真切

lyrics.lyric: I turn to you
When I lose the will to win
I just reach for you and
I can reach the sky again
lyrics.tlyric: 便拥有了再次翱翔的信心

lyrics.lyric: I can do anything
'Cause your love is so amazing
lyrics.tlyric: 因为你的爱是如此惊人

lyrics.lyric: 'Cause your love inspires me
And when I need a friend
You're always on my side
Giving me faith
That gets me through the night
For a shield from the storm
For a friend, for a love
To keep me safe and warm
I turn to you
For the strength to be strong
lyrics.tlyric: 你是那股让我坚强的力量

lyrics.lyric: For the will to carry on
lyrics.tlyric: 你是那份让我坚持下去的意志

lyrics.lyric: For everything you do
I turn to you
For the arms to be my shelter
lyrics.tlyric: 因为你的臂湾就是我的庇护所

lyrics.lyric: Through all the rain
For truth that will never change
For someone to lean on
For a heart I can rely on through anything
lyrics.tlyric: 因为你的真心可以支撑我度过一切

lyrics.lyric: For that one who I can run to
For a shield from the storm
For a friend, for a love
To keep me safe and warm
I turn to you
For the strength to be strong
lyrics.tlyric: 你是那股让我坚强的力量

lyrics.lyric: For the will to carry on
lyrics.tlyric: 你是那份让我坚持下去的意志

lyrics.lyric: For everything you do, for everything that's true
lyrics.tlyric: 你为我付出的一切，都如此真切

lyrics.lyric: I turn to you

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.00] 作词 : Warren
[00:01.00] 作曲 : Diane Warren
[00:28.00]When I'm lost in the rain,
[00:36.00]In your eyes I know I'll find the light
[00:40.00]To light my way.
[00:43.00]And when I'm scared,
[00:47.00]And losing ground,
[00:51.00]When my world is going crazy,
[00:55.00]You can turn it all around.
[01:00.00]And when I'm down you're there
[01:03.00]- pushing me to the top, girl.
[01:07.00]You're always there,
[01:09.00]giving me all you've got.
[01:13.00]For a shield from the storm,
[01:17.00]For a friend, for a love
[01:20.00]to keep me safe and warm
[01:25.00]I turn to you.
[01:28.00]For the strength to be strong,
[01:32.00]For the will to carry on
[01:37.00]For everything you do,
[01:40.00]for everything that's true
[01:43.00]I turn to you.
[01:51.00]When I lose the will to win,
[01:59.00]I just reach for you and
[02:02.00]I can reach the sky again.
[02:06.00]I can do anything
[02:14.00]'Cause your love is so amazing,
[02:17.00]'Cause your love inspires me.
[02:23.00]And when I need a friend,
[02:25.00]You're always on my side
[02:30.00]Giving me faith
[02:32.00]that gets me through the night.
[02:36.00]For a shield from the storm,
[02:40.00]For a friend, for a love
[02:43.00]to keep me safe and warm
[02:48.00]I turn to you.
[02:52.00]For the strength to be strong,
[02:55.00]For the will to carry on
[03:01.00]For everything you do,
[03:04.00]I turn to you.
[03:10.00]For the arms to be my shelter
[03:13.00]through all the rain,
[03:16.00]For truth that will never change,
[03:20.00]For someone to lean on,
[03:25.00]For a heart I can rely on through anything,
[03:31.00]For that one who I can run to...
[03:40.00]For a shield from the storm,
[03:44.00]For a friend, for a love
[03:47.00]to keep me safe and warm
[03:52.00]I turn to you.
[03:55.00]For the strength to be strong,
[03:58.00]For the will to carry on
[04:03.00]For everything you do,
[04:07.00]for everything that's true
[04:10.00]For everything you do,
[04:14.00]for everything that's true
[04:17.00]I turn to you.

tlyric.lyric:
[by:SusanHerh]
[00:28.00]当我迷失在雨中
[00:36.00]透过你的双眸 ，我知道自己定会找到明灯
[00:40.00]照亮我的道路
[00:43.00]当我恐惧
[00:47.00]当我失去一切
[00:51.00]当我的世界逐渐疯狂
[00:55.00]你总能扭转乾坤
[01:00.00]当我意志消沉你在我身旁
[01:03.00]鞭策我不断攀登
[01:07.00]你总是在一旁
[01:09.00]给予我你所拥有的一切
[01:13.00]像是风雨中的庇护
[01:17.00]像朋友， 亦像恋人
[01:20.00]保护我，给我温暖
[01:25.00]我心属于你
[01:28.00]因为那股让我变强的力量
[01:32.00]因为让我坚持下去的意志
[01:37.00]因为你所做的一切
[01:40.00]因为所有真实的一切
[01:43.00]我心属于你
[01:51.00]当我失去成功的斗志
[01:59.00]我总是会奔向你
[02:02.00]便拥有了再次翱翔的信心
[02:06.00]变得无所不能
[02:14.00]因为你的爱是如此神奇
[02:17.00]因为你的爱激励了我
[02:23.00]当我需要朋友时
[02:25.00]你总是在我身边
[02:30.00]给予我信念
[02:32.00]伴我渡过黑夜
[02:36.00]像是风雨中的庇护
[02:40.00]像朋友， 亦像恋人
[02:43.00]保护我，给我温暖
[02:48.00]我心属于你
[02:52.00]因为那股让我变强的力量
[02:55.00]因为让我坚持下去的意志
[03:01.00]因为你所做的一切，因为所有真实的一切
[03:04.00]我心属于你
[03:10.00]因为你的臂湾就是我的庇护所
[03:13.00]让我避过所有的雨水
[03:16.00]因为永恒不变的真理
[03:20.00]因为你是我的依靠
[03:25.00]因为你的真心可以支撑我度过一切
[03:31.00]我只想朝你奔去……
[03:40.00]像是风雨中的庇护
[03:44.00]像朋友， 亦像恋人
[03:47.00]保护我，给我温暖
[03:52.00]我心属于你
[03:55.00]因为那股让我变强的力量
[03:58.00]因为让我坚持下去的意志
[04:03.00]因为你所做的一切
[04:07.00]因为所有真实的一切
[04:10.00]因为你所做的一切
[04:14.00]因为所有真实的一切
[04:17.00]我心属于你
